Test Case Summary: This is to send an email request to reset the forgotten password
Test Case Execution Steps:
1. Go to home page
2. Click on forgot password link
3. Provide email address
4. Click send reset request button
Test Case Expected Result: Must see a popup saying check email account for a reset password email

Test Case Summary: This is to check the subscription of pricing.
Test Case Execution Steps:
1. Go to home page
2. Scroll down and find search subscription.
3. Click on check pricing.
Test Case Expected Result: When we click on check pricing button it should show us the price of the subscription for rollingradius.
Remarks: Pricing structure needs to be changed
